comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
@Alex-302 
Yes, the problem is still there.
But if i use another pc with adguard for windows installed (not browser extension), the problem doesn't appear.
Problem exists if using adguard browser extension only.

I attach the export results of my windows adguard settings.
[20220810_102309_adg_settings_7.10.3961.0.zip](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/files/9296242/20220810_102309_adg_settings_7.10.3961.0.zip)

comment.body:
@Alex-302
我删除了一些不需要或可能重复的过滤器，目前问题已解决，但就是不知道当时的问题是怎么回事，您试试去中国版主页看看能不能复现

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: jump2.bdimg.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://jump2.bdimg.com/f?kw=ogn&ie=utf-8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fjump2.bdimg.com%2Ff%3Fkw%3Dogn%26ie%3Dutf-8) ### Comment Username: @1reche > 有些贴吧没有这种广告，有些贴吧有。比如：OGN吧 明日方舟内鬼吧 抗压背锅吧这种广告比较多，而且网页有时候会出现一两个广告，有时候三四个。非常困扰 .偶尔能正常屏蔽 偶尔不能 。有时候在不能正常屏蔽这种广告的页面刷新一下可能就正常屏蔽了但是也会出现刷新了还是没有屏蔽的情况。强制刷新F5也是一样，非常薛定谔。同类广告屏蔽扩展我也试过 都是一样。难道就没有解决的办法吗？ 麻烦开发者看能不能解决，谢谢。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/shlERDe.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/4kz250X.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.1 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

Language-specific:
AdGuard Chinese Other extensions used: | 油猴

comment.body:
It should be already fixed by `AdGuard Annoyances filter`, but I have added additional rule.
Please update filters after about 2 hours and then check again.

issue.title: images.yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)
